channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @lucas_gonze The only solution is to not put the docs there in the first place.
item.source:markdown: @lucas_gonze The only solution is to not put the docs there in the first place.

item.description: There's a problem with putting docs on GitHub: you can't redirect from the pages if you need to relocate them. Unless of course I'm missing something.
item.source:markdown: There's a problem with putting docs on GitHub: you can't redirect from the pages if you need to relocate them. Unless of course I'm missing something.

item.description:
I am tired of movies about vampires and the walking dead. I like love stories you know like An Officer and a Gentleman.

Or Better Call Saul. :-)
item.source:markdown:
I am tired of movies about vampires and the walking dead. I like love stories you know like An Officer and a Gentleman.
Or Better Call Saul. :-)

item.description: I loved the last episode of Better Call Saul.
item.source:markdown: I loved the last episode of Better Call Saul.

item.description: @om @Apple YES!! -- this is what is so ridiculous about people freaking out about when Facebook does something that Google does.
item.source:markdown: @om @Apple YES!! -- this is what is so ridiculous about people freaking out about when Facebook does something that Google does.

item.description: Some asshole steals all your photo albums, some of which contain launch codes for your nuclear missiles, and then has the gall to ask where his passports went. All while he's running around free to do more of this bullshit. We are a wimp country to put up with this miscreant.
item.source:markdown: Some asshole steals all your photo albums, some of which contain launch codes for your nuclear missiles, and then has the gall to ask where his passports went. All while he's running around free to do more of this bullshit. We are a wimp country to put up with this miscreant.

item.description: All of a sudden Gmail looks different and it's asking a bunch of questions I don't want to understand and have no interest in.
item.source:markdown: All of a sudden Gmail looks different and it's asking a bunch of questions I don't want to understand and have no interest in.

item.description: BTW here's a piece I wrote in 2015 about the idea of news orgs using feed readers and what we now call news products to create a place for themselves in the future of news.

item.description: Anything that gets us to hate each other based on race, age, gender is a wedge, and it's designed to keep us from unifying, which allows the assholes to keep control.
item.source:markdown: Anything that gets us to hate each other based on race, age, gender is a wedge, and it's designed to keep us from unifying, which allows the assholes to keep control.

item.description: @AdamKinzinger @Acosta @AndrewYang Typical. A reporter knows that making Yang will cost him nothing, he's not part of one of the big parties, so he gets his chance to show how hard-hitting he is. No cost to him.
item.source:markdown: @AdamKinzinger @Acosta @AndrewYang Typical. A reporter knows that making Yang will cost him nothing, he's not part of one of the big parties, so he gets his chance to show how hard-hitting he is. No cost to him.

item.description: Deno, a competitor of Node.js, did something smart -- they're going to run Node packages, thus making conversion easier. The big deal of Node is its ecosystem. https://t.co/lQ3s1tMHfi
